identified_themes.theme_name: Inefficiency and Time-Consuming Time Logging Process
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_01]: "Logging my time at the end of the day takes way too long. I have to click through so many screens just to add time for one project task. It's easily 10-15 minutes wasted."

[FDBK_09]: "Honestly, the biggest issue is remembering to do it. Because it's such a hassle, I often put it off until Friday afternoon and then struggle to remember exactly what I worked on early in the week. My submitted hours are probably not very accurate sometimes."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a significantly faster and simpler way to log their daily project hours to reduce wasted time and improve adoption, which in turn affects data accuracy.

identified_themes.theme_name: Outdated User Interface and Poor Navigability
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_02]: "The overall look is very dated. It feels clunky, and sometimes I'm not sure which button I'm supposed to press to submit my timesheet."
[FDBK_08]: "The dropdown list for project codes is massive and in a random order. Finding the right code takes ages, and I've picked the wrong one by mistake more than once because I was rushing."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users require a modern, intuitive interface with clear navigation and easier methods for finding information, such as project codes, to improve usability and reduce errors.

identified_themes.theme_name: Lack of Mobile Accessibility for Remote Time Logging
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_03]: "I travel a lot for client meetings. It's impossible to log time easily when I'm not at my desk. I wish I could just quickly add entries from my phone right after a meeting."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users who work remotely or travel frequently need a convenient way to log time from mobile devices to ensure timely and accurate entries.

identified_themes.theme_name: Difficulties with Data Management (Corrections and Reporting)
supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_05]: "Why can't I easily see a summary of my hours for the week broken down by project? I need this for my own records, but the portal doesn't offer a simple view like that. Generating reports seems impossible for regular users."
[FDBK_07]: "Making corrections is a nightmare. If I accidentally submit my timesheet before it's complete, getting it back, editing it, and resubmitting involves way too many steps and approvals."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need simpler processes for viewing their own time summaries and making corrections to their timesheets without excessive steps or approvals.

supporting_feedback_snippets: [FDBK_04]: "The system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon, especially on Thursdays and Fridays. Trying to submit my timesheet before leaving is frustrating."
identified_themes.inferred_need_or_pain_point: Users need a system that performs reliably and quickly, especially during peak usage times, to avoid frustration and lost productivity.

task_2_survey_design.survey_goal: To gather specific, quantifiable data from SynthoTech employees regarding their current pain points with the NovaTime portal, the importance of potential improvements (informed by initial feedback), and their preferences for new features, in order to guide the prioritization and design of enhancements aimed at improving user experience, efficiency, and data accuracy.

survey_questions.question_text: On a scale of 1 to 5, where 1 is 'Very Dissatisfied' and 5 is 'Very Satisfied', how would you rate your overall satisfaction with the current NovaTime portal for logging your project hours?
survey_questions.purpose: To establish a baseline for overall user satisfaction and identify the general sentiment towards the current system.

survey_questions.question_text: Which of the following aspects of the NovaTime portal causes you the most frustration or inefficiency? (Please select up to three)
options: Time taken to log daily hours
Outdated look and feel of the interface
Difficulty navigating and finding information (e.g., project codes)
Inability to log time from a mobile device
Complexity of correcting mistakes in timesheets
Lack of clear summaries or reports of my logged time
survey_questions.purpose: To quantify which of the identified pain points from initial feedback are most prevalent and impactful for users.

survey_questions.question_text: How important is it for you to be able to log your time using a mobile device (e.g., smartphone, tablet)? (1 = Not at all important, 5 = Extremely important)
survey_questions.purpose: To specifically assess the demand and perceived importance of mobile access among the broader user base.

survey_questions.question_text: How often do you experience difficulty finding the correct project code in NovaTime?
survey_questions.purpose: To understand the frequency and scale of the problem related to project code selection.

survey_questions.question_text: If NovaTime were to be improved, which of the following enhancements would be most beneficial to your daily time logging? (Please select your top two)
options: Faster process for daily time entry
Modernized and more intuitive user interface
Ability to save frequently used project codes/tasks
Easier access to personal time summaries/reports
survey_questions.purpose: To gather user preferences on specific improvements, helping to prioritize development efforts towards features that offer the most value.

survey_questions.question_text: Do you have any other specific suggestions or features you would like to see in an improved NovaTime portal?
survey_questions.purpose: To capture any additional insights, ideas, or pain points not covered by the structured questions, providing an opportunity for users to offer unique feedback.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Streamline Core Time Logging Process for Efficiency
supporting_evidence: Reference to scenario_description.txt: Project goal is to 'increase efficiency for employees logging time.'
Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_01]: 'Logging my time... takes way too long... 10-15 minutes wasted.'
Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_09]: 'Because it's such a hassle, I often put it off... My submitted hours are probably not very accurate sometimes.' (Impacts efficiency and data accuracy)

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Improve User Interface (UI) and Navigation, including Project Code Selection
supporting_evidence: Reference to scenario_description.txt: Project goal is to 'enhance user experience.' Anecdotal feedback suggests portal is 'cumbersome.'
Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_02]: 'look is very dated. It feels clunky, and sometimes I'm not sure which button I'm supposed to press...'
Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_08]: 'dropdown list for project codes is massive and in a random order. Finding the right code takes ages...' (Impacts UX and data accuracy)
Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_04]: 'system becomes incredibly slow, almost unusable, late in the afternoon...'
Reference to scenario_description.txt: A 'cumbersome and inefficient' portal implies performance is a key factor. Enhancing UX and efficiency requires a performant system.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Investigate and Implement Mobile Access for Time Logging
supporting_evidence: Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_03]: 'impossible to log time easily when I'm not at my desk. I wish I could just quickly add entries from my phone...'
Reference to scenario_description.txt: Enhancing UX and efficiency for all users, including those who travel, aligns with project goals.

prioritized_list.requirement_or_focus_area: Simplify Timesheet Correction Process and Improve User Data Visibility
supporting_evidence: Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_07]: 'Making corrections is a nightmare...'
Reference to initial_feedback.txt [FDBK_05]: 'Why can't I easily see a summary of my hours... Generating reports seems impossible for regular users.'
Reference to scenario_description.txt: Project goal to 'improve the accuracy and reliability of the time tracking data' is supported by easier corrections and user data visibility.
